name: Spiers Salads
description: Salad boxes, salsa pots, bagels, salad platters and BBQ packs. Fresh coffee, energy balls, flapjacks, feta cheese, chicken skewers. Order by midnight for next weekday delivery (can specify am/pm). Free delivery for orders over £30 (SE4,8,14,15,22 - otherwise £2.85) or £40 (SE5,10,13,16,21,23,24 - otherwise £4.95).
safetyTips: Please enquire directly about safety measures.
